caption: Table 1: Comparisons for Online Prediction from Experts under DP Constraints
description: This table compares the regret and communication cost of different algorithms for online prediction from experts under various differential privacy constraints. It contrasts single-client and federated settings for both stochastic and oblivious adversaries, highlighting the impact of collaboration and privacy mechanisms on the performance of the algorithms.  The table also includes lower bounds to benchmark the optimality of the proposed algorithms.

caption: Table 1: Comparisons for Online Prediction from Experts under DP Constraints
description: This table compares the performance of different algorithms for online prediction from experts under differential privacy constraints. It considers both stochastic and oblivious adversaries, and compares single-client and federated settings.  Metrics include regret (the difference between the algorithm's cumulative loss and that of the best expert), communication cost, and the type of differential privacy guarantee achieved (pure DP or approximate DP).
